snippet.title: COVID patients alarm, Dignity denied even in death?  | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Patients literally rot to death! Grandmom in hospital toilet & naked man found in COVID ward. Forget about getting proper care, now, dignity denied even in death. Don’t allow leaders to getaway. 

It’s not fair on patients well after death. We cannot be complacent during this crisis. says, Nephron Chairperson Dr Sanjeev Bagai.

Our public health infrastructure has been on the verge of collapse for several years due to insufficient funding by Central Govt & State Govts. COVID is spreading rapidly in Maharashtra & Delhi because of its dense population. says,  Political Analyst Sumanth Raman.

Are some of the State Govts focusing more on PR than actual work? says, Lawyer Shehzad.

What we can see is the exhibition of inhuman & insensitive nature over Corona crisis. says, BJP MP & National Spokesperson GVL Narasimha Rao.

#CoronaDeathWards

snippet.title: BJP leader Mehraj-u-Din Malla kidnapped by a terrorist released unharmed | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, BJP leader Mehrajuddin Malla who was kidnapped by a terrorist in the Sapore district of Jammu & Kashmir is been release. Ajay Pandita and Waseem Bari were shot dead, and but now, BJP leader released unharmed?

It is not for the 1st time that political workers are getting kidnapped in J&K. PDP & NC workers have died in Kashmir saving the Kashmir for India says, Columnist Ifra Jan.

One of the early casualties of Jehad was Yousuf Halwai who dared to wave the national flag on August 15, 1989, in Srinagar. says, Activist Sushil Pandit.

Watch the faceoff between Activist Sushil Pandit and Political Analyst Vivek Srivastava over the kidnapping of BJP leader in J&K.

snippet.title: Sonia cheers for army valour, but Rahul disrespects forces? | India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar
snippet.description:
On India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar, while President Kovind has praised surgical strikes in Parliament today, Congress President Rahul Gandhi has seen rather disinterested. 
Sonia Gandhi has cheered for Army’s valour, but Rahul stopped Sonia mid-track. President Kovind on Thursday addressed a joint sitting of both houses of Parliament, the Rajya Sabha and the Lok Sabha.

We ask: By disrupting Sonia’s applause, isn’t Rahul only emboldening army baiters? When Rahul Gandhi has distanced himself from those who questioned the surgical strikes, can he be accused of disrespecting the forces? If Rahul Gandhi is genuinely proud of our armed forces, can he explain why he stopped Sonia Gandhi from applauding the valour of forces during Balakot?

#RahulInsultsForces

snippet.title: Deepika Padukone's Whatsapp 'MAAL' group haunts her; Trouble ahead for the actor? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, we discuss the maal chats group issue and how Deepika was allegedly the admin of the group. NCB sources say Rakul Preet Singh has named Kshitij Prasad during her interrogation. She took names of 4 celebrities who Kshitij allegedly supplied to.  

Summoning is not making anybody an accused as of now says Ishkaran Singh Bhandari. Inside details NCB grilling schedule for tomorrow: Deepika Padukone to be quizzed at 10 AM. Shraddha Kapoor & Sara Ali Khan to be questioned at 10 AM. Prima facie this is a clear fact of ‘wrongdoing’ which requires investigation says, Hitesh Jain. 

We have to go by the NDPS Act which says if you have consumed drugs or bought them for personal use, then the offence is from 6 months to 1 year says Lawyer Abha Singh. 

#DeepikaDoubleDisclosure

snippet.title: Pok on India weather map, Safest in PM Modi's hands? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, 73-yr long dithering ends! PoK is now on India’s weather map as India will cross ‘LoC-shaman’ Rekha. PM Narendra Modi's clear message to the world: India will ‘Reclaim’ all of Kashmir. ‘Who held India back for more than 70 years?’

PoK on India’s weather map is a symbolic move & I don’t think Pakistan’s response should be given too much attention. says, Strategic Affairs Expert Sushant Sareen.

On April 30, 2020, Govt of India objected to Pak’s provincial election in PoK. says, BJP's  MP & National Spokesperson GVL Narasimha Rao.

#ModiSetsEyesOnPok

snippet.title: CM Arvind Kejriwal seals Delhi borders for a week, India unlocks but state blocks? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, CM Arvind Kejriwal's big ‘Delhi first’ push as he seals Delhi borders for a week. This move sparks ‘Bed for residents’ debate & raises eyebrows India wide. ‘India unlocks but Kejriwal blocks?’ 

Bats for ‘Islamist’ Tipu Sultan, retained honour for Aurangzeb but stalls Vivekananda statue. ‘Icon for India not for Congress'? 

Is the 'Misplaced priorities' argument against the construction of a Vivekananda statue motivated by appeasement politics on the part of the Congress?

We are more concerned about more people coming into Delhi for treatment and how do we handle the load. We'll only close the borders for a week. We have increased the beds for COVID patients in Delhi hospitals significantly. says, AAP's National Spokesperson Dr Ajoy Kumar.

#DilliForDelhiitesDebate #CongBlocksVivekananda

snippet.title: COVID-19 vaccine just months away? | Ori Ben Herzl EXCLUSIVE | India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar
snippet.description:
Everyone across the globe is looking for a cure for the Coronavirus pandemic. The International science community is trying to find the best possible way to defeat this COVID-19 virus. The plasma therapy is believed to be the first cure but there is also a parallel effort to find a vaccine so that in future we don't have to be contained in our homes. 

On India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar, we have Jerusalem's Migal Galilee Research Institute's Vice President Ori Ben Herzl on the vaccine his institute has prepared to fight Coronavirus. Watch the video to know more!

snippet.title: Ranchi's anti-lynching protest turns violent, who will they blame for this? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront, Padmaja Joshi discusses how a mob protesting against the lynching of 22-year-old Tabrez Ansari, unleashed violence in Jharkhand's Ranchi. Some protesters reportedly injured youth with a knife, thrashed some people and smashed window panes of vehicles in Ranchi.
Ansari was beaten up by a mob in Dhatkidih village in Jharkhand’s Seraikela district on June 17 on suspicion of bike theft and was forced to chant 'Jai Sri Ram'. The victim succumbed to his injuries on June 22.

snippet.description:
ISRO scripts history today with the launch of Chandrayaan-2. Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other leaders congratulated the scientists of ISRO.
As India celebrates merit of its scientists but Congress credits Nehru. In India’s moment of glory, Congress shines the torch on Nehru. And also Dr Manmohan Singh for sanctioning the Chandrayan 2 project in 2008.'

snippet.title: Shiv Sena & Sonia Gandhi linked to attack Hindus but militarises Islam? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Shiv Sena signs controversial order and legitimizes the role of ‘Hate’ group. BJP has slammed the moved calling it a ‘Betrayal of Hindus’. Sadhus lynched in Maharashtra, but ‘Islamists’ have given pedestal is the real question here. 

At a time when the activities of the members of the PFI have been under the scrutiny of NIA & MHA, couldn't the Sonia Gandhi- Shiv Sena have sought the co-operation of other Muslim NGOs in Maharashtra?’

snippet.title: Why does Amnesty have four outlets in India and earning profits? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, we discuss MHA’s recent statement on Amnesty International saying, ‘Human Rights cannot be an excuse or defying the law of the land. It has violated FCRA norms’. The statement comes after Amnesty has announced that it is checking out of India for which it is blaming the government for being harassed.

Amnesty is functional in over 150 countries and has faced criticism by the government in all of them. However, after Russia India is the first country where it is shutting down its operations, Paranjoy Guha Thakurta, a Senior Journalist tells Rahul Shivshankar. Dr. Sudhanshu Trivedi also questions Amnesty having 4 outlets and earning profits whereas no other NGO has FDI.

Furthermore, topics like Amnesty being caught peddling fake news and yet refusing to apologise and their press release over one of its branch shutdown in Delhi in 2014 are all discussed on India Upfront.
#AmnestyEnds #AmnestyGetOut

On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Sensational Yes Bank probe scoop. TIMES NOW's investigation unearths the real reason why ‘Yes Bank defaulters’ dodged  Enforcement Directorate (ED) summons. ED remand note has answers.

Bhavatosh & Madhavdas with details.

Without even going to the Parliament, Rahul Gandhi taunts the govt from a safe haven. ‘As Indians are fighting the fear, is Rahul Gandhi fanning frenzy?’

When members of his own party have backed the Government's efforts and called for a bipartisan approach, is Rahul Gandhi upholding national interest by taking a contrarian line?

snippet.title: Delhi riots key witness intimidated, Insidious 'Islamist' plot unravels | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Sensational statement accessed on Delhi riots. The fresh FIR states that one of the key witnesses has claimed that he received a death threat over the phone on July 4, 2020, saying ‘you will be killed by Faisal Bhai’. 

Why is it that there is an entire lobby trying to continuously portray Delhi riots not as a killing of 53 Indians but as an onslaught of unwitting Hindus against Muslims? says, Lawyer Shehzad.

It is the politicians who have milked cow of religion time & again. says, Political Analyst Dr Syed Asad Abbas.

Anybody who indulges in this kind of rabble-rousing is not doing any service to this community rather doing an immense disservice to its community. says, Advocate Sai Deepak J.

#DelhiRiotDevelopment

snippet.description:
On India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar, Prime Minister Narendra Modi pledges 'Sabka Vishwas' but hatemongers won't listen; vow to continue lynchings. This is the reality on the ground! Who has issued a licence to lynch?
When hatemongers issue dire threats can PM Narendra Modi dismiss fear among minorities as a myth?
Looking at the results can Congress deny that its competitive Hindutva has eroded the ‘Vishwas' of minorities?
Has the fringe become more emboldened to spew hate against Muslims after BJP’s win?

snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, Explosive Markaz report shows they ‘Wilfully’ infected India, Maulana Saad’s defiance was ‘Deliberate’ & for 2 weeks they ‘Bred’ Corona. ‘Islamophobia’ lobby EXPOSED. ‘Did Maulana Saad wage Corona Jihad?’ 

‘Will the lobby still come to the defence of the Markaz organisers after the Delhi Police has laid out thoroughly how warnings were 'Wilfully' defied by them when holding the event?’

snippet.title: Left Lobby-Pakistan ISI Link EXPOSED, Fight for rights sponsored? | India Upfront
snippet.description:

In the details mentioned in the NIA's chargesheet, Gautam Navlakha's link to ISI was out. Is left-lobby being funded to carry out campaigns to malign India? Navlakha proudly gave Kashmiris a call for arms struggle says, Anand Ranganathan.

snippet.title: Rhea Chakraborty's bail plea dissected; 'Coerced confession' tactic used to escape? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront, after massive development in the Sushant Singh Rajput death case, ten arrests including Rhea Chakraborty that were made to bust the underground drug network that was going on in Mumbai. Rhea Chakraborty's remand copy stated that she was actively involved in the drug syndicate. Times Now has accessed Rhea Chakraborty's bail plea in the Sessions Court. 

Rhea Chakraborty allegedly accuses Narcotics Control Bureau of coercing her into confessing 'guilt' saying 'Narcotics Control Bureau is spinning a false narrative to implicate her. Times Now has also accessed Rhea Chakraborty's statement to Narcotics Control Bureau and she told the Narcotics body that she 'took hash a few times'. 

Ketan Vaidya, a journalist explains Madhavdas G that he thinks that Rhea Chakraborty is not the only culprit in this particular case who has retracted from the statements. Hitesh Jain, a BJP spokesperson explains that retraction of confessions is an age-old tactic. Rahul Eashwar, an activist, believes that Rhea Chakraborty had every right to defend herself. Shehzad, a lawyer explains how the trend of Rhea Chakraborty's lawyer is to play the 'victim card' at every opportunity.

#RheaChakraborty #RheaArrested #RheaChakrabortyArrested

snippet.title: Congress targets BJP chief Amit Shah, Sick 'SUAR KA ROG' slur | India Upfront With Rahul Shivshankar
snippet.description:
In the debate tonight, we will talk about something which has been in politics for the last 25 years. Bad mouthing and talking bad about opposition political leader is a thing to be in news.
Senior Congress leader B K Hariprasad mocked the health condition of BJP president Amit Shah, saying he contracted swine flu since his party made an alleged bid to destabilise the Congress-JDS government in Karnataka. The remark by Hariprasad, a Rajya Sabha MP and Congress general secretary, sparked an angry reaction from the BJP with the party's Karnataka unit calling him a "rogue" and described his remarks as "shameless" that showed his party's "culture" and his "mental stability". 
When it is equally guilty of resorting to name calling especially when it comes to minorities can the BJP today cry victim? Listen in for more details!

snippet.description:
On India Upfront tonight, major controversy erupts in the Supreme Court of India today. Advocate Utsav Baines file an additional affidavit against CJI Ranjan Gogi claiming that he has proof that the allegations of sexual harassment against CJI were trumped up.
The woman alleged that she was fired after she refused Gogoi's "sexual advances" and subsequently her husband and brother-in-law, who worked in the Delhi Police were also suspended and the complaint is dated back to October 2018.

snippet.title: Indian Forces prove their mettle, China begins deescalation? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront with Rahul Shivshankar, After trying to steal India’s land, China begins climbdown in Ladakh. India’s forces prove their mettle & firm PM Narendra Modi Sarkar refuses to blink. Congress won’t question China Ki Chori but doubts our Forces integrity.

‘At a time when India’s forces have managed to stare down china & prompted a pull-back, should the Opposition be undermining their efforts by talking about 'Lost territory'?’

‘Now that the Chinese have begun to de-escalate in Ladakh, will the Opposition acknowledge that the Centre and the Army's approach have prevailed?’

1st clear signs of a climbdown. Eyeball to eyeball in Galwan & the Finger area of Ladakh has ended. Both sides have moved back between 1& 2 kilometres. Srinjoy with details.

snippet.title: Aamir Khan meets Turkish first lady, Does he back anti-India Islamo fascists? | India Upfront
snippet.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar takes you through the massive controversy that erupted after Bollywood Actor Amir Khan met Turkish First Lady. In 2015, Amir had addressed the press stating that he does not find India as ‘safe’ place to live and now pictures of him meeting an Anti-India Activist has emerged.
This meeting comes just after Turkey openly backed Pakistan sponsored Kashmir separatist movement. Turkish Government, recently, also converted former Catherdral and museum, Hagia Sophia, into a mosque. Why was this meet taken up by Aamir Khan?
‘When Amir Khan talked about his wife leaving India in 2015, then maybe he must have thought of going to Turkey and settling down there’ says Author Anand Ranganathan. While Senior Advocate Sanjay Hegde says, ‘Amir Khan's wife Kiran Rao wanted to leave India please note, it’s his wife’ and Political Analyst, Abhijeet Iyer says, ‘Several Bond movies were also shot in Istanbul, none of the actors went to meet and click photos’.

localized.title: Aamir Khan meets Turkish first lady, Does he back anti-India Islamo fascists? | India Upfront
localized.description:
On India Upfront today, Rahul Shivshankar takes you through the massive controversy that erupted after Bollywood Actor Amir Khan met Turkish First Lady. In 2015, Amir had addressed the press stating that he does not find India as ‘safe’ place to live and now pictures of him meeting an Anti-India Activist has emerged.
This meeting comes just after Turkey openly backed Pakistan sponsored Kashmir separatist movement. Turkish Government, recently, also converted former Catherdral and museum, Hagia Sophia, into a mosque. Why was this meet taken up by Aamir Khan?
‘When Amir Khan talked about his wife leaving India in 2015, then maybe he must have thought of going to Turkey and settling down there’ says Author Anand Ranganathan. While Senior Advocate Sanjay Hegde says, ‘Amir Khan's wife Kiran Rao wanted to leave India please note, it’s his wife’ and Political Analyst, Abhijeet Iyer says, ‘Several Bond movies were also shot in Istanbul, none of the actors went to meet and click photos’.
